Articles.Content: I'm not sure someone asked this before, but can someone please make the Philae for KSP, since KSP have asteroids too now, it fits perfectly together.
this would violate EULA and ESA agreements

this would violate EULA and ESA agreements

How would it? He's asking for someone to make this into a mod.

This mod has a Philae inspired probe klaw that works on asteroids, the rest you can make out of cores and static solar panels...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79675
Some people built Rosetta/Philae replicas with existing parts (either stock or modded). Maybe that would suffice?
oh, and Dmagic has a pretty good surface sample drill...
